</head>

<body lang="ZH-CN" link="blue" vlink="purple" style="tab-interval:21.0pt;text-justify-trim:
punctuation">

<div class="WordSection1" style="layout-grid:15.6pt">

<p class="MsoNormal"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:normal"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";
color:black">The 2nd International Conference on Contemporary Education and
Economic Development<br>
</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";
color:black"><br>
Theme: Education and Economy<br>
<br>
ORGANIZED by Modern International Green Culture Communication Association (<span class="SpellE">MIGCCA</span><span class="GramE">)</span><br>
<br>
DATES: October 26-27, 2019<br>
PLACE: Beijing, China<br>
<br>
DEADLINES:<br>
FULL PAPERS  October 20, 2019. All full-paper submissions will be reviewed for
publication in the refereed Conference Proceedings with ISBN number. The
authors of these articles will receive their publications in person (one copy
per a registered participant will be provided free of charge).<br>
<a name="_GoBack"></a><br>
<span class="SpellE">CEED</span> 2019 is for people, who want to participate in a
major international forum, get published, network with colleagues from many
countries and sharing similar or complementary interests! <br>
<br>
It is very pleased to announce that the Keynote Address at the <span class="SpellE">CEED</span> 2019 will be delivered by Prof. Dr. <span class="SpellE">Ubaldo</span> <span class="SpellE">Comite</span>, a Professor of the
University of Calabria, Italy, and an award-winning author of many influential
articles in lading scholarly journals and books.<br>
<br>
Papers related to all areas of History of Education, Home Education,
Alternative Assessment of Teaching, Human Resource Management and Development
in Education, Anthropology of Education, Children's Psychology, Instructional
Design, Cognitive Psychology, Interpersonal Relationships and Communication,
Comparative Education, Introduction to Education, Introduction to Special
Education, Creative and Individualized Teaching, Law of Education,</span><span lang="EN-US"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";color:black">Marketing Theory and
Applications, Consumer Behavior, Corporate Governance, Decision Sciences,
Development Planning and Policy, Economic Methodology, Monetary Economics,
Product Management, Supply Change Management, Welfare Economics are invited to
this international conference, which is expected to be attended by authors from
nearly all parts of the World. People without papers can also participate in
this conference, and they are invited to serve as session chairs or
discussants, as well as informal contributors to the academic quality of this
international event. <br>
<br>
PUBLICATION<span class="GramE">:</span><br>
<span class="SpellE">DEStech</span> Publications<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";color:black">Proceedings series of <span class="SpellE">DEStech</span> Transactions on Social Science, Education and Human
Science, ISSN: 2475-0042.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";color:black"><br>
INDEXING:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";color:black">All of the papers collected
from <span class="SpellE">CEED</span> 2019 will be submitted to Web of Science  <span class="SpellE">CPCI</span> (Conference Proceedings Citation Index), <span class="SpellE">CNKI</span>, Scholar Google for worldwide online citation.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";color:black"><br>
To submit your full paper, please email it as an attachment (acceptable formats
are .doc and .<span class="SpellE">docx</span>) to </span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="mailto:ceed2019@vip.sina.com"><span class="SpellE"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif"">ceed2019@vip.sina.com</span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif";
color:black">. All submissions will be double blind peer-refereed by members of
the Conference Review Committee. Authors will be notified of the review outcome
within 5-7 working days after the arrival of their submissions.<br>
<br>
Authors, who could NOT travel to Beijing for visa or other reasons, will have
the same publication opportunities.<br>
<br>
For inquiries, please contact the Conference Organizing Committee via </span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="mailto:ceed2019@vip.sina.com"><span class="SpellE"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif"">ceed2019@vip.sina.com</span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif"">
<span style="color:black">or visit our Website: </span></span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://sctrack.sc..html"><span class="SpellE"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif"">http://www.ceed2019.org</span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"lucida Grande","serif""><span style="mso-spacerun:yes">  </span><span style="color:black"><span style="mso-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>
